text: in this video we are going to be talking
about packing your toiletries when you
are just bringing a carry-on on your
adventures most airport regulations
state that you can only bring up to 100
milliliters or 3.4 ounces per liquid in
your carry-on and all of those liquids
so say you bring shampoo conditioner
body wash all of those must be put into
one see-through bed and cannot exceed
one liter in total so I'm here to share
with you how I pack those liquids and
this is not a sponsored video I just
discovered these types of containers
called go tube by human gear and I am
already in love for years I was using
these containers that I got at the
dollar store they're very cheap but they
are not squishy they're very hard and
the opening where I insert my liquid
here is so tiny that when I try to put
conditioner in it it kind of just went
everywhere it's it's almost impossible
to put conditioner in here neatly this
for example is shampoo and it is very
difficult to get all of the shampoo out
of this bottle because you can't squeeze
it and you can't put your finger inside
so I can't scoop it out the go tube
container is a little pricier its 850
per container but this is gonna last me
a long time especially for someone who
travels all the time it's worth the
investment so I'll just open this up
here to show you the opening is nice and
wide so I'm not going to have
conditioner squirting out all over the
place and overflowing over the top when
I'm trying to transfer it into this and
it's super flexible and squishy so I can
get out every last drop of conditioner
or shampoo or body wash or moisturizer
or whatever I want to put in here I can
get out every last drop of it this also
seals very well so there's not going to

entire time except when you're up

you're still with all of your items when

and get

my studs and they snap right shut so you

not getting out basically for things

so I've put a couple of these into my

else like razors and q-tips
I just put into a little ziploc bag
protect it keep everything clean as so

once I have filled up all of these

there we go
security and airports love me they can
